item.title: Minister claims 'sabotage' behind Chagos debate delay - BBC
item.description: Minister claims ‘sabotage’ behind Chagos debate delay BBC’Act of great stupidity’: Trump launches another tirade against a NATO ally. This time it’s the UK CNBCAcquire territory, export culture wars: How to make sense of Trump’s ‘new imperialism’ France 24European leaders endure a new level of public embarrassment as Trump dials up the insults CNNUK ratification of the Chagos Archipelago treaty will not violate international law Chatha…
